author: lmc_security
content:
Hi all, I am Lucas Martin Calderon.

I founded web3sec.news, the Hedgehog protocol, and Pentestify, a smart contract security startup, specialised in smart contract vulnerability detection using SoA AI. Postgrad from UCL's MSc in InfoSec and Blockchain Security (University College London), and I originally started off as a pentester in Paris and working for a bank in Web2, in my previous startup, incubated also at STATION F.

By the way, I am going to ETHGlobal Paris, Barcelona, and DeFi Security Summit, DM me if you wanna join, would be great to have you there!

Happy to connect here too: https://twitter.com/lmc_security
